original_title: Nick Jr. Favorites: We Love Our Friends
overview: Celebrate Valentine’s Day with your friends from Nickelodeon! Episodes such as Dora’s Best Friends and Diego’s Sammy Valentine showcase the themes of friendship, love and celebration for over 2 hours of entertainment. Properties included in this collection include Dora the Explorer, Go, Diego, Go!, Wonder Pets!, Yo Gabba Gabba!, Blue’s Clues, and Ni Hao, Kai-lan.
title: Nick Jr. Favorites: We Love Our Friends
